lead_paragraph: The chief spokesman for the Rio Olympics says, "I can guarantee in the name of Rio 2016 that the athletes can compete in safety."

headline.print_headline: Spokesman for Rio Olympics: Athletes Can Compete in Safety
headline.main: Spokesman for Rio Olympics: Athletes Can Compete in Safety
